list.description:
Re upload of a sight I made for the ZTZ99-ll and the ZTZ99-lll updated it a little bit and added an English version

DOES NOT WORK ANYMORE

#ztz99

My second ever custom sight for the absolute best girl of all time, #raphtalia from #shieldhero . I've included two sights, one with Raphtalia on the right, and one with her on the left (i personally prefer the left). Image sauce is from an artist named Kusubii (link to og pic https://danbooru.donmai.us/posts/3562227?q=kusubii check them out, they make absolutely fantastic Raphtalia art) Tank in screenshot is og M1 Abrams with M774 for reference on size of the image in the gunsight. Color changes to orange when crosshair color change is used in game.

#universal #alltanks #sight #anim...

My first ever WT Live post and first ever custom creation (even tho ive played since 2017)! I created a #universal tank gunsight for #alltanks using the #genshin_impact character #ganyu . HUGE thank you to @Minedeployder for the tutorial on how to make custom sights and @ToMaKi for pointing me in the right direction and for the inspiration. I searched for literal hours for the source of my image but couldn't find it anywhere (found it in my photo archives from early Aug and can't find where I got it from). Anyways, the sample images are from an M1 Abrams 105 with M774 ammo shown, but like stat...

Sight for Ferdinand for simulator battles. Sight is designed for APCBC.

See more (including a collection of my sights and how to change the colour of the sight) here:
https://live.warthunder.com/post/979176/en/

If you would like to know how sim sights work, visit this:
https://live.warthunder.com/post/971966/en/

It's Pizza time!

Artist: https://twitter.com/DR_13x?s=20

Source: https://danbooru.donmai.us/posts/3333877?q=c.c.+

A basic sight for Abrams tank series (works on any tank), inspired by the Battlefield 4 tank sight
to install go to UserSights in your game directory and put it in the folder for the tank you want the sight to be on

the sight will work on any tank, but tanks with different zoom levels may have the sight broken

#m1a2 #m1a1hc #m1a1 #m1 #abrams #all_tanks #universal #sights #modern #semihistorical

Characters come from Otonari no Tenshi

Made it for a friend

I'll just share it and I hope you guys would like it

Put the blk files to WarThunder/UserSights/all_tanks

If you guys don't have the all_tanks folder, just make a new folder in your "UserSights" folder and name it "all_tanks".

If you guys want to change to blue color back to black go to the blk file

Find the crosshair color section, and turn all the numbers to 0,0,0,0.

Sight for The Male for simulator battles. It works for all shells (the only exceptions are 300 and 500 meters marks for HE, shell lands a little lower).

See more (including a collection of my sights and how to change the colour of the sight) here:
https://live.warthunder.com/post/979176/en/

If you would like to know how sim sights work, visit this:
https://live.warthunder.com/post/971966/en/

#sb #sim #simulator #simulatorbattles #ac1 #ac1_sentinel #sentinel

Just Monika

For reasons not yet understood by man, Monika from the esteemed, completely peaceful, and totally not horrifying Doki Doki Literature Club has managed to transcend her reality and end up in the War Thunder world as a gunsight for all of your tanks.

Will you shoot your way into her heart? Probably not as that would leave quite a mess, but she'll certainly provide moral support for your ventures in armored combat by pointing directly at whatever you need to shoot at - the tip of her finger is literally the center of the gunsight, so aim at whatever she's pointing ...

Komi Shouko komi san wa komyushou desu (Komi Can't Communicate) universal sight

Merry christmas everyone!

santa komi from komi san wa komyushou desu chapter 88

lots of sizes. plz take a look at images I uploaded to find proper size.
colored ver & skp file included

unzip and move .blk files to War Thunder\UserSights\all_tanks

#anime #komi_san_wa_comyushou_desu #komi_shouko #komi #shouko #komi_cant_communicate #universal_sight #universal #sight

RBT-5 is fun to play again. With the latest updates the ballistics model of the TT-250 tank torpedo changed. Now you can very reliably place this round on any target up to 950 meters away.

#rbt5 #accurate #doomtank

Sight BLK and installation manual is in the zip file.

#anime #tohru #t_72 #t_80 #t_90

#relatable #nonhistorical #thermalsights #modern

Relatable sight for all tanks. Works best with laser rangefinder and white thermal vision to give You nice pink image

#challenger #challenger_2 #semihistorical

Semi-historical sight pack for Challenger mk2,3 and Challenger 2.

#m1a1 #m1a2 #m1ip #semirealistic

Semi-Realistic sight pack for M1A2, M1A1, M1IP. I tried to do them as playable as it possible.

FZ18_Ult is a customization friendly/easy sight/aim reticle to use on/for all ground vehicles
(tested on 4 nations & all available vehicles in said 4 tech tree's NP whatsoever)for all game modes including

Auto - correction / Gun Sight Adjustment in RB/Sim game modes(I'm not 100% sure where/when did I downloaded it but it's at least 2+ yrs old/In-Use if you like) before WT finally implemented one or more in-game sights for vehicles with Laser Rangefinder for easier target acquiring/destruction.

Enjoy

Hello all
its been a while since I last made a post, so I wanted to share the Custom sights I am using since about 2 years now

They are universal and work on any tank, just put the BLK files into the "all_tanks" folder and have fun!

I made 3 sights:

  • Base version
  • AA version (with rings helping you estimate lead)
  • ATGM sight (center dot is missing to help seeing the target at very long range)

    further versions may come if I see a need.

    The sights are based on the sight in the M1 abrams, with slight changes
    the horizontal lines are all 2 m...

#historical #m1a2 #thermalsights #modern #realistic

Realistic sight for M1A2 and the rest of digital Abrams tanks which we do not have ingame yet. Recreated as good as possible in WT

#historical #m1abrams #m1ip #m1a1 #m1a2 #thermalsights #modern #realistic

Realistic thermal sight for M1, M1IP, M1A1, M1A1HC and M1A2. Adjusted to WT viewfinder and distance indicator size
